Ingredients.1: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast meat - cubed

Ingredients.4: 1  yellow bell pepper, seeded and sliced into strips

Ingredients.5: 1  red bell pepper, seeded and sliced into strips

Directions.1: Build a campfire and allow the fire to burn until it has accumulated a bed of coals. Rake the coals into a flat bed on one side of the fire.

Directions.2: Combine chicken, onion, mushrooms, peppers, garlic, and potatoes in a large bowl or a large resealable plastic bag. Pour in olive oil and lemon juice and toss to coat.

Directions.3: Evenly divide the mixture between 4 large sheets of aluminum foil. Top each with another sheet of foil and roll up the edges tightly. Double wrap each packet with another sheet of foil.

Directions.4: Cook over the preheated coals until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 40 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
